note:
Often High Pope Bob Dobberson, at your service.

I'm a "hacker" with years of experience with unix systems, and knowledge of more than a handful of programming languages.

I will learn what you know by asking silly questions.

I do not like all of my friends, and I think it is silly to want that.

I am fallible. You will not like everything I say. Have patience while we learn together; I will endeavor for the same.

No gods, no masters, plenty of irony.

fields.name: Matrix / Element
fields.value: @bobdobberson:matrix.org
